summary: Comprehensive stock market education website organized by difficulty levels (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced) with interactive learning tools, searchable glossary, tutorials, visual diagrams, and quick reference guides covering stock basics, chart reading, investment strategies, risk management, and market terminology
architectural_notes: React-based frontend with Tailwind CSS for styling
Responsive design for accessibility across all devices
Content organized by three difficulty tiers: Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced
Interactive learning components including searchable glossary and tutorials
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional hero banner image showing financial charts and growth concepts for the homepage (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Icon illustration representing beginner level with simple upward trend (beginner-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon illustration representing intermediate level with multiple chart lines (intermediate-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon illustration representing advanced level with complex analytical graphics (advanced-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Diagram showing bull and bear market patterns (bull-bear-diagram.dim_800x400.png)
- Visual chart showing candlestick pattern examples (candlestick-patterns.dim_600x400.png)
- Infographic illustrating portfolio diversification concept (diversification-infographic.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with clear navigation to three main difficulty level sections: Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced
Build Beginner section with foundational stock market content including: what stocks are, basic terminology, how stock markets work, and getting started with investing
Build Intermediate section with content on chart reading, technical analysis basics, fundamental analysis, trading strategies, and portfolio management
Build Advanced section with content on advanced trading strategies, risk management techniques, options and derivatives, market psychology, and sophisticated analysis methods
Create a searchable glossary of stock market terms accessible from all pages, with clear definitions and examples for each term
Implement step-by-step tutorials and lessons throughout each difficulty level section, with clear progression from one concept to the next
Add visual examples and diagrams throughout the content to illustrate stock market concepts, including chart patterns, market trends, and investment strategies
Create quick reference guides and cheat sheets that summarize key concepts, formulas, and strategies for easy access

Design a cohesive, professional visual theme that conveys trust and financial expertise while remaining approachable for beginners, using a sophisticated color palette with clean typography and well-structured layouts

new_feature_requests.summary: Educational content organized by difficulty levels (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)
Searchable glossary of stock market terms
Visual examples and diagrams for stock concepts
Quick reference guides and cheat sheets
